sentences.sContent: the aggrieved party (=  the person who has suffered  )

synos.tran: 受委屈的，愤愤不平的；权利受到不法侵害的
侵害，伤害（aggrieve的过去分词形式）；使悲痛

remMethod.val: ag(做) + griev(悲伤) + e → 使受委屈， 使痛苦

trans.tranCn: 受虐待的, 权利受到不法侵害的, 抱不平的
trans.tranOther: having suffered as a result of the illegal actions of someone else
